page.title: 12Education, Melchbourne
page.content: There is no school in Melchbourne, so the children have to be taken out of the village for their education. There is a choice for the 4/9 year group. They can go to Eileen Wade Lower School at Dean or Riseley Lower School. The advantages of Riseley are that it has a nursery unit for the under fives and also that a special school coach is provided. The headmistress of Riseley Lower School lives in Melchbourne. The 9/13 year olds go to Margaret Beaufort Middle School at Riseley, also by school coach. The older children, 13/18 year olds are taken to Sharnbrook Upper School. I n addition there are fee-paying schools at Bedford, Dean and Kimbolton.
